name: event-forwarder
author: Aravind Vadamalaimuthu

scripts.postinstall: (cd layers/powertoolsSDK/nodejs && npm install) && (cd layers/slackSDK/nodejs && npm install) && (cd layers/xraySDK/nodejs && npm install)  && (cd layers/xray/nodejs && npm install)
scripts.build:test: NODE_ENV=test npm run wp:dev && npm run build:cdk:test
scripts.build:prod: NODE_ENV=production npm run wp:prod && npm run build:cdk:test
scripts.build: npm run wp:dev && npm run build:cdk:test
scripts.build:cdk:test: npm run build:cdk && npm run test
scripts.cdk:synth: npm run build && cdk synth EventForwarderStack --profile=av
scripts.cdk:diff: npm run build && cdk diff EventForwarderStack --profile=av
scripts.cdk:deploy: npm run build && cdk deploy EventForwarderStack --verbose --profile=av --hotswap
scripts.cdk:destroy: npm run build && cdk destroy EventForwarderStack --verbose --profile=av
scripts.cdk:synth:data: npm run build && cdk synth EventForwarderDataStack --profile=av
scripts.cdk:diff:data: npm run build && cdk diff EventForwarderDataStack --profile=av
scripts.cdk:deploy:data: npm run build && cdk deploy EventForwarderDataStack --verbose --profile=av --hotswap
scripts.cdk:destroy:data: npm run build && cdk destroy EventForwarderDataStack --verbose --profile=av
scripts.cdk:deploy:remotes: npm run build && cdk deploy RemoteEventRouterStack* --verbose --profile=av-s --hotswap
scripts.cdk:destroy:remotes: npm run build && cdk destroy RemoteEventRouterStack* --verbose --profile=av-s
scripts.cdk:synth:remotes: npm run build && cdk synth RemoteEventRouterStack* --profile=av-s
scripts.cdk:diff:remotes: npm run build && cdk diff RemoteEventRouterStack* --profile=av-s
scripts.wp:analyze: npm run wp:stats && npx webpack-bundle-analyzer stats.json

description: This is a blank project for CDK development with TypeScript.
